title: RDP Scanner
whatIsIt: A probe attempting to identify Windows Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) services. These scans check if port 3389 is open and if it speaks the RDP protocol.
impact: Low. This is usually reconnaissance to find exposed windows servers.

title: BlueKeep RDP Exploit
whatIsIt: An attempt to exploit the BlueKeep vulnerability (CVE-2019-0708) in Windows RDP. This allows remote code execution without authentication.
impact: Critical. Successful exploitation gives full control over the server.
technicalNote: Often identified by 'mstshash' cookie or specific channel creation requests.

title: HTTP Scanner
whatIsIt: A generic HTTP request probing for web servers.
impact: Low to Medium depending on the path requested.

title: HTTP Proxy Probe
whatIsIt: A request using the HTTP CONNECT method (e.g. CONNECT api.ip.pn:443). The attacker is checking if your server allows open proxying to external domains.
impact: Medium. If successful (HTTP 200), your server becomes an open proxy for malicious traffic.

title: SSH Scanner
whatIsIt: An attempt to connect to SSH services, often to brute-force credentials or identify versions.
impact: Low. Reconnaissance.

title: SIP Scanner
whatIsIt: Probing for VoIP systems. Often SIPv2 REGISTER attempts to find valid extensions or brute force passwords.
impact: Low. Reconnaissance.
technicalNote: Uses SIP methods like REGISTER, OPTIONS, INVITE.

title: Redis Exploit Attempt
whatIsIt: An attempt to run commands on a Redis server, often to gain RCE or steal data. Unauthenticated Redis is a common target.
impact: High. Can lead to server compromise via CONFIG SET or data loss via FLUSHALL.
technicalNote: RESP protocol. Common commands: CONFIG, SLAVEOF, FLUSHALL.

title: Ethereum Node Scanner
whatIsIt: Scanning for open Ethereum/Blockchain nodes (JSON-RPC) to steal wallets or mine crypto.
impact: High if funds are in the node wallet.

title: Ethereum Wallet Drain Attempt
whatIsIt: Attempt to unlock accounts or send transactions from an open Ethereum node.
impact: Critical. Direct financial loss.

title: SSDP/UPnP Discovery
whatIsIt: Simple Service Discovery Protocol probe, used to find UPnP devices (routers, cameras). Can be used for reflection DDoS.
impact: Low (Recon) or Medium (DDoS amplification).

title: TLS/SSL Scanner
whatIsIt: Scanning for SSL/TLS services to identify certificates or versions.
impact: Low. Reconnaissance.

title: WebLogic T3 Exploit
whatIsIt: Attacks against Oracle WebLogic's T3 protocol, often attempting RCE via deserialization.
impact: Critical. RCE is common in WebLogic vulnerabilities.

title: Java RMI Exploit
whatIsIt: Java RMI or Deserialization attacks. Attempts to execute code by sending malicious serialized objects.
impact: Critical. Java deserialization often leads to RCE.
technicalNote: JRMI header or AC ED 00 05 magic bytes.

title: Log4Shell (CVE-2021-44228)
whatIsIt: Attempt to exploit Log4j 2 vulnerability via JNDI injection.
impact: Critical. Allows full RCE.

title: Config File Probe
whatIsIt: Bot looking for sensitive configuration files like .env, .git/config, or AWS credentials.
impact: High. Leaks secrets and credentials.

title: Port Scan (Empty)
whatIsIt: A TCP connection that sends no data and disconnects. Used to check if a port is open.
impact: Low. Pure reconnaissance.

title: RIPE Atlas / Magellan
whatIsIt: Internet measurement probes from RIPE Atlas. These are NOT malicious attacks but research scanners measuring internet connectivity.
impact: None. Benign research traffic.

title: Palo Alto Cortex Xpanse
whatIsIt: A benign security scanner from Palo Alto Networks used for Attack Surface Management. It identifies exposed services for its customers.
impact: None. Benign reconnaissance.
technicalNote: User-Agent: Hello from Palo Alto Networks...

title: SIPVicious (Friendly Scanner)
whatIsIt: A known malicious scanner tool (SIPVicious) used to brute-force or enumerate SIP (VoIP) systems. Despite the name 'friendly-scanner', it is aggressive.
impact: Medium. Can lead to SIP credential theft or toll fraud.

title: Generic VOIP Scanner
whatIsIt: A scanner probing for Voice over IP services.
impact: Low/Medium. Reconnaissance for potential VoIP attacks.
